title: Lubalin Graph Alternates
content:
Hi,

i am looking for a scan of Lubalin Graph that contains the alternates that are missing from the versions availably digitally.

Can anyone help?

Thanks

Seb
author: all about seb

comments.content: im very interested in that, too. in fact, im interested in any alternative letters for slab serifs.
Thank you Mark - very much appreciated.
